channel.title: Christof Paar - Introduction to Cryptography
channel.description:
Recorded semester of an introductory to cryptography lectured by Christof Paar. Covers many popular modern encryption algorithms both symmetric and asymmetric including but not limited to: 3DES, AES and RSA. Also contains information about hashing and authentication protocols such as MACs and certificates.
[YouTube - Christof Paar - Introduction to Cryptography](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL6N5qY2nvvJE8X75VkXglSrVhLv1tVcfy)
